name: Black Friday Simulator (efrenaguilar95)
description:
Black Friday Simulator is a Foddian style game created for the 2021 Ludwig Game Jam.

It's Black Friday, and today is your last chance to get the BaeStation 5 before the new Arachnaman game comes out. Use the TV (that you got an AMAZING deal on) to toss yourself over the hordes of shoppers to get it before they do!

Controls

Left Click/Drag - Throw TV

Right Click - Go to TV, pickup TV

ESC - Pause/Restart

Created by: Ricky Tham and Efren Aguilar
